activities:
Personal Information Received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:
TalkPoint ‘s platforms contain tools that are used to produce live or on-demand webcasts with audio and video that have been designed, scheduled and delivered using managed or self-service options for our clients.  As part of the registration process to view the webcast event, end-users may be required to provide certain identifiable personal information in order to fulfill and process orders for our clients.  In addition, TalkPoint will not collect any type of credit card information before, during, or after the webcast.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: TalkPoint processes customer data that is covered by the EU and/or Swiss Data Protection Safe Harbor Framework(s).  The data covered also includes manually processed data.
recoursemech: TalkPoint uses BBB EU Safe Harbor, www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints, as the independent recourse mechanism that is available to investigate unresolved complaints.
